entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
